title: Increasing Likelihood of Going to Gym After Work

content.question: Carlos wants to lose weight but is having a hard time motivating himself to go to the gym after work because he enjoys watching movies after work instead. To increase his likelihood of going to the gym, Carlos should

choices.label: reward himself just before going to the gym
set a goal of going to the gym at least seven times a week
reward himself immediately after going to the gym
make an effort to spend time watching movies when not at the gym

content.answer: reward himself immediately after going to the gym

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
